description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国军事人物，曾任兰州军区副政治委员，第五届全国人大代表。
description.en: A military figure of the People's Republic of China, who served as the Deputy Political Commissar of the Lanzhou Military Region and was a deputy to the 5th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省份。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 山东省烟台市的旧县名，刘凌的出生地。
description.en: A former county in Yantai, Shandong Province, and the birthplace of Liu Ling.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家，通常简称为中国。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia, commonly known as China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军曾存在的一个大军区。
description.en: A former military region of the Chinese People's Liberation Army.

nodes.id: 第五届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第五届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第五届最高国家权力机关。
description.en: The fifth session of the highest state authority in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 全称国民革命军第八路军，是中国抗日战争时期，由中国共产党领导的常规军队。
description.en: The Eighth Route Army, officially the Eighth Route Army of the National Revolutionary Army, was a regular army led by the Communist Party of China during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的创立者和唯一执政党。
description.en: The founder and sole ruling party of the People's Republic of China.
Liu Ling was from Penglai, Shandong.

description.zh-cn: 刘凌曾担任兰州军区副政治委员。
description.en: Liu Ling served as the Deputy Political Commissar of the Lanzhou Military Region.

relationships.target: 第五届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 刘凌是第五届全国人大代表。
description.en: Liu Ling was a deputy to the 5th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 根据分类“八路军人物”，刘凌是八路军的一员。
description.en: Based on the category 'Eighth Route Army figures', Liu Ling was a member of the Eighth Route Army.

description.zh-cn: 根据分类“中国共产党党员”，刘凌是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Based on the category 'Communist Party of China members', Liu Ling was a member of the Communist Party of China.
